name: hack_job
description:
a broken pong-like for love2d jam 2023. made in 72 hours. i'm new to lua so most of my time was spent digging into libraries trying to accomplish basic things. i did not package it for distribution, so you'll have to boot through love.exe manually. don't look at the code, it's horrendous.

raters please disregard this entry! i'm sharing it for posterity and because it's nice to have any output at all in the process of participating :-)
